INSERT INTO sku_stock (clothing_id, sku_code, price, stock, low_stock, pic, sale, sp_data) VALUES
(#{item.clothingId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.skuCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.price,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.stock,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.lowStock,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.pic,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.sale,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.spData,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

REPLACE INTO sku_stock (id,clothing_id, sku_code, price, stock, low_stock,pic, sale, sp_data) VALUES
(#{item.id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.clothingId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.skuCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.price,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.stock,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.lowStock,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.pic,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.sale,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.spData,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
